entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
